title: Bloomberg's Ciolli on Winners, Losers, Stock of the Day (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Ciolli on Winners, Losers, Stock of the Day (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Bloomberg stocks reporter Joe Ciolli on today's market winners, losers, and Stock of the Day: Coca-Cola Co. (KO).
